about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of "Bober Constructions DEMO", where you can get a taste of the building adventures and test your skills before diving into the full game! Take on the role of one of 4 fearless beaver-builders and tackle a limited set of missions that hint at even greater challenges in the full version.

In this demo, you'll put your abilities to the test by constructing bridges, walls, and other structures – all within dynamic tasks that demand precision and teamwork. Time is ticking, and clients won't always be patient, so show that you can handle the pressure!

With colorful graphics, a humorous atmosphere, and a sneak peek of absurdly fun challenges, this demo will leave you craving more. Find out if you've got what it takes to become a true master beaver-builder!

Play "Bober Constructions DEMO" and discover if you're ready for the full experience. Let’s get to work, beavers!

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: i5-3320M @ 2.60 GHz / AMD Ryzen 3 3200u
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 5000+
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
